title: Thanks Riot for Making Top lane Into one Play Style only.
body:
every lane got X,Y play styles
but for some reason the meta after season 6 kicked the "Y" play style from the Top
and now we left with X and people who cant adapt to play style "X" pretty fked for almost 2 years.

Bye Top lane was the best role and the best skins on my account is for top :(
feelsbad ill never use this skins again until Riot Fix the Top lane

(btw others lanes still have more play styles than Top Lane who force you to play 1 play style)

replies.body: Could you explain at all what you're bitching about?
This. The original post doesn't make sense
Toplane is arguably the most diverse lane on the rift. Tanks, bruisers, ranged, and mages all make their way up there. There's not one "Style" that only works.

What playstyle?
tanks work, Attack speed stacking bruisers work, adc top works.

I don't see the problem.

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ENwqaNNX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-04T06:11:47.501+0000)
>
> What playstyle?
> tanks work, Attack speed stacking bruisers work, adc top works.
> 
> I don't see the problem.

juggernauts and mages as well
you can play anything top and as long as you are good will win
im guessing its cuz its ranged vs melee if thats the case play jax or chogath.

Come on, man, don't surrender to the meta. If all your best skins are for toplaners, take them somewhere else. Most toplaners make great supports if you play them with nuance. Don't let the dream die!
